column4: I just lost my connection- so, what's everybody's opinion on the stability of hoary?  about how many MBs are updated/day on a standard install?
what is everybody using here, warty or hoary?  is hoary >stable or <stable than sid
you mean a new gnome development release (as in, a new 2.9.x), right?
yeah, we track gnome very closely and tend to upload 2.9 series the same day they release it
